trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs> object to specify the inertial behavior of a manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs>对象来指定操作的惯性行为。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the inertial behavior for each type of manipulation separately by using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.TranslationBehavior%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.ExpansionBehavior%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.RotationBehavior%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用单独指定每种类型的操作的惯性行为<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.TranslationBehavior%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.ExpansionBehavior%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.RotationBehavior%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Each property is a type of object that represents the inertial behavior and in each case, you can specify the following:
trans-unit.target: 每个属性都为类型的对象，表示惯性行为以及每种情况下，你可以指定以下：

trans-unit.source: The initial velocity of the inertia when it begins.
trans-unit.target: 惯性开始时初始速度。

trans-unit.source: The desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends.
trans-unit.target: 惯性结束时的操作所需的位置。

trans-unit.source: The desired deceleration of the inertia.
trans-unit.target: 惯性所需减速度。

trans-unit.source: You typically specify either the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends or the desired deceleration of the inertia, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 你通常指定惯性结束时的操作所需的位置，或者惯性，但不是两个所需的减速。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting> event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting>事件处理程序和设置需要的减速转换、 扩展以及在惯性过程中使用的旋转。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自在更大的示例[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 取消操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the manipulation was successfully canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功取消操作，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the method succeeds, the default <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> sends previous touch events as mouse down, mouse move, or mouse up events to the element and future manipulation events do not occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法成功，则默认<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>发送以前为鼠标按下鼠标移动触控事件或鼠标释放到元素的事件，且不发生未来操作事件。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置延伸惯性运动减慢的速率。

trans-unit.source: The rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement
trans-unit.target: 延伸惯性运动减慢的速率

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.ExpansionBehavior%2A> property to do the following:
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.ExpansionBehavior%2A>属性来执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置开始时指定惯性的初始速度<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的操作所需的扩展，通过设置惯性结束时<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置指定所需的减速的惯性<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You typically set either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 你通常设置<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>，但不是两者。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rates of changes to the manipulation that occur before inertia starts.
trans-unit.target: 获取惯性开始发生之前发生的操作的变化速率。

trans-unit.source: The rates of changes to the manipulation that occur before inertia starts.
trans-unit.target: 惯性开始发生之前发生的操作的变化速率。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the container that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin" /> property is relative to.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin" /> 属性所相对的容器。

trans-unit.source: The container that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin" /> property is relative to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin" /> 属性所相对的容器。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the point from which the manipulation originated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置操作的起源点。

trans-unit.source: The point from which the manipulation originated.
trans-unit.target: 操作的起源点。

trans-unit.source: If more than one point of contact initiated the manipulation, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin%2A> property is the point between all of the points of contact.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个联系点启动了操作，<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin%2A>属性是所有的联系点之间的点。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of objects that represents the touch contacts for the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示操作的触摸触点的对象集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of objects that represents the touch contacts for the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 一个由表示操作的触摸触点的对象组成的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rate of slowdown of rotational inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置旋转惯性运动减慢的速率。

trans-unit.source: The rate of slowdown of rotational inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: 旋转惯性运动减慢的速率。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.RotationBehavior%2A> property to do the following:
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.RotationBehavior%2A>属性来执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置开始时指定惯性的初始速度<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 惯性结束通过设置时指定所需操作旋转<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置指定所需的减速的惯性<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You typically set either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 你通常设置<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>，但不是两者。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object that specifies the behavior of a manipulation during inertia.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定某操作在惯性发生期间的行为的对象。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the behavior of a manipulation during inertia.
trans-unit.target: 指定惯性发生期间的操作行为。

trans-unit.source: You typically do not need to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 通常不需要调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs> instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用上的属性<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs>相反。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parameter" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameter" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the rate of slowdown of linear inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置线性惯性运动减慢的速率。

trans-unit.source: The rate of slowdown of linear inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: 线性惯性运动减慢的速率。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.TranslationBehavior%2A> property to do the following:
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.TranslationBehavior%2A>属性来执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置开始时指定惯性的初始速度<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的操作所需的位置，通过设置惯性结束时<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置指定所需的减速的惯性<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You typically set either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 你通常设置<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>，但不是两者。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。
